lines: 1. Kwonde duto motelona,Anadhi nikech agene;Aparo kaka nothona,Rembe nochwer e Kalwari.
Yesu notelna pile ka,Yesu notelna yo duto;En e Osiep mageno chuth;En nothona e Kalwari.
2. An amor kawinjo chikne;Amor chutho kotelona;To chunya mor kuom dwarone,Kaparo thone Kalwari.
3. Adhiyo nyime mak aluor,Amor kuom Kristo, Jawarna;Ageno neno Osiepna,Yesu mothona Kalwari.
